property.name: userQueryString
property.value: SELECT USERNAME AS NAME FROM "USER" WHERE USERNAME = ?

property.name: rolesQueryString
property.value: SELECT G.NAME FROM "USER" U JOIN USER_GROUPS UG ON U.id = UG.user_id JOIN "GROUP" G ON UG.GROUP_ID = G.id WHERE U.USERNAME = ?

property.name: credentialsQueryString
property.value: SELECT USERNAME, USERPASSWORD AS PASSWORD FROM "USER" WHERE USERNAME = ?

property.name: userPropertiesQueryString
property.value: SELECT FIRSTNAME, SURENAME FROM "USER" WHERE USERNAME = ?
